channel.title: Sevador 718 loading 742
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TUQsv.png[/img][b] [url=http://sevador.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/fs7og.png[/img]Sevador - Homepage[/url] [URL=http://sevador.com/forum][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img]Sevador - Forums[/URL] [URL=http://youtube.com/Sevador718][IMG]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img]Sevador - YouTube[/URL] [/b]
Welcome to the Sevador advertisement! Here at Sevador, our motto is 'Where Amazing Happens'. Our goal is to give you as much
of a realistic RuneScape Private Server there could possibly be, without significant downtime, un-professional staff members,
and mediocre content.
Without futher ado, let us invite you to play the most advanced private server out there!
[ul][*]Prestige, you can prestige when all your combat level's are 99 including summoning, When you prestige you gain
better drop rate's. Gain access to unique weapons and armour by completing several RuneScape-like quests.[*]All players have
the ability to change the appearance of your armour, if you prefer armour in the 718 revision (non-updated barrows armour),
you can do this![*]Automatic donations and forum integration! You will not have to wait to receive your upgrade.[*]Up-to-date
RuneScape graphics.[*]Active, growing community with potential.[*]Squeal of Fortune (as of July 20th, 2012; before it was
released)[*]Money Pouch (as of July 18th, 2012; before it was released)[*]PvP artefacts exchangable to Mandrith at edgeville
bank for coins. This is based on your earning potential in the wilderness.[*]Revenant wilderness fighting and training. One
of the most active pk locations on the server.[*]Polypore Dungeon, where you can kill monsters for Ganodermic Gear![*]Glacor
Dungeon, where you can achieve Steadfast Boots,Ragefire Boots,Glaiven Boots.[*]Dark Invasion Mini-Game, where you kill
zombies for points to buy chaotic weapons and more![/ul]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/11lsj13.png[/img][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ot3xiu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/en0q0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/1y4jk1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/20z5vmr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/141jyok.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Sevador 718 loading 742
item.dc:creator: @Wallie Wallie
item.description:
@Wallie wrote:

I’m not the owner.

Just the in/game developer

So I don’t deal with website related.

Read full topic

item.title: Sevador 718 loading 742
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’m not very keen on the website, it doesn’t feel very RSPS-like. It feels more like I’m looking at a hosting site rather than a game.

EDIT: You could at least give credit where it’s due and show that the site isn’t 100% yours http://panzermedia.com/

Read full topic
